overview:
Ronald van Woensel (1961) is a T-shaped serial entrepreneur with broad experience in all aspects of ICT. He has over 35 years experience as founder, manager, analyst, designer, developer and consultant.

Primarily a bootstrap entrepreneur, but he also closed various seed and series-A investment rounds for his companies and completed a number of very successful exits in the past.

He is currently managing partner of Innovader BV. He is also involved as Entrepreneur in Residence providing his expertise to the startups of incubator utrechtinc.nl
